Notes: An area consisting of an invisible body of water that the player can swim in. Several other objects can interact with the water as well.

Obj_arg0.Name: Push Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The speed to push the player when inside this area. Doesn't affect swimming on the water surface and doesn't work for spherical or hemispherical areas. For cube-shaped areas, the player will be pushed along the area's rotated Z axis. In cylindrical areas, however, the player will be pushed along the rotated Y axis.

Obj_arg1.Name: Water Type
Obj_arg1.Description: What kind of water this area holds. Cold water periodically damages the player.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
